text: Propargyl chloride is an organic compound with the formula HC2CH2Cl. It is a colorless liquid and a lacrymator. It is an alkylating agent that is used in organic synthesis. == See also == * Allyl chloride * Propargyl * Propargyl alcohol ==References== ==External links== * Entry at ChemSpider Category:Propargyl compounds Category:Organochlorides
title: Propargyl chloride
